# toscutil

Useful functions for everyday programming.

# Installation

``` r
# From CRAN (stable version)
install.packages("toscutil")
# From Github (development version)
devtools::install_github("toscm/toscutil")
```

## Usage

To use any function or data object, first [install](#installation) the
package and then just enter any object’s fully qualified name into a
running R session,
e.g. [`toscutil::now_ms()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/now.md).
You can find a curated list of existing functions at
[toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/index.html).
Alternatively, you can load the package first, using command
[`library("toscutil")`](https://github.com/toscm/toscutil/) and then
access any symbol directly by its name,
e.g. [`now_ms()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/now.md).

## Contribute

For details on how to contribute to this package, please see
[CONTRIBUTING.md](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/CONTRIBUTING.md).

# Package index

## Base Extensions

Extended versions of base R functions

- [`capture.output2()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/capture.output2.md)
  : Capture output from a command
- [`cat2()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/cat2.md) :
  Concatenate and Print
- [`catf()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/catf.md) :
  Format and Print
- [`dput2()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/dput2.md) :
  Return ASCII representation of an R object
- [`fg`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/fg.md) : Foreground
  Color Codes
- [`help2()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/help2.md) :
  Return help for topic
- [`named()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/named.md) :
  Create automatically named List
- [`norm_path()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/norm_path.md)
  : Return Normalized Path

## Condition Checking

Function for condition checking

- [`ifthen()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/ifthen.md) :
  Shortcut for multiple if else statements
- [`is.none()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/is.none.md) :
  Truth checking as in Python
- [`` `%none%` ``](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/op-null-default.md)
  : Return Default if None

## Function Writing

Functions for writing functions

- [`caller()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/caller.md) :
  Get Name of Calling Function
- [`function_locals()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/function_locals.md)
  : Get Function Environment as List
- [`locals()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/locals.md) :
  Get specified Environment as List
- [`sys.exit()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/sys.exit.md)
  : Terminate a non-interactive R Session

## Documentation

Functions for reading, checking and writing documentation

- [`DOCSTRING_TEMPLATE`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/DOCSTRING_TEMPLATE.md)
  : Docstring Template
- [`check_pkg_docs()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/check_pkg_docs.md)
  : Check Documented Functions in a Package
- [`find_description_file()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/find_description_file.md)
  : Find DESCRIPTION File
- [`get_docstring()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/get_docstring.md)
  : Get docstring for a Function
- [`get_formals()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/get_formals.md)
  : Get formals of a Function
- [`get_pkg_docs()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/get_pkg_docs.md)
  : Get Documented Functions in a Package
- [`read_description_file()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/read_description_file.md)
  : Read DESCRIPTION File into a List
- [`split_docstring()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/split_docstring.md)
  : Split a docstring into a Head, Param and Tail Part
- [`update_docstring()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/update_docstring.md)
  : Update docstring for a Function

## Live Programming

Functions for experimenting in interactive (live) R sessions

- [`corn()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/corn.md) :
  Return Corners of Matrix like Objects
- [`rm_all()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/rm_all.md) :
  Remove all objects from global environment
- [`stub()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/stub.md) : Stub
  Function Arguments
- [`trace_package()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/trace_package.md)
  : Traces function calls from a package
- [`untrace_package()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/untrace_package.md)
  : Untraces function calls from a package

## Path Finding

Functions returning important paths

- [`config_dir()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/config_dir.md)
  : Get Normalized Configuration Directory Path of a Program
- [`config_file()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/config_file.md)
  : Get Normalized Configuration File Path of a Program
- [`data_dir()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/data_dir.md)
  : Get Normalized Data Directory Path of a Program
- [`getfd()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/getfd.md) : Get
  File Directory
- [`getpd()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/getpd.md) : Get
  Project Directory
- [`home()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/home.md) : Get
  USERPROFILE or HOME
- [`xdg_config_home()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/xdg_config_home.md)
  : Get XDG_CONFIG_HOME
- [`xdg_data_home()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/xdg_data_home.md)
  : Get XDG_DATA_HOME

## S3 Methods

S3 methods

- [`predict(`*`<numeric>`*`)`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/predict.numeric.md)
  : Predict Method for Numeric Vectors

## Time Related

Function returning datetime

- [`now()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/now.md)
  [`now_ms()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/now.md) : Get
  Current Date and Time as String

## Deprecated

Deprecated functions that should no longer be used

- [`cat0()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/cat0.md) :
  Concatenate and Print
- [`cat0n()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/cat0n.md) :
  Concatenate and Print
- [`catfn()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/catfn.md) :
  Format and Print
- [`catn()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/catn.md) :
  Concatenate and Print
- [`catnn()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/catnn.md) :
  Concatenate and Print
- [`catsn()`](https://toscm.github.io/toscutil/reference/catsn.md) :
  Concatenate and Print
